service.name: /pcodC01.pc
service.query: SELECT VENEMP_ID , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.RESI_NO) AS RESI_NO , A.KOR_NM , A.STR_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME , A.JOB_CD , A.VEN_CD , C.VEN_NAME , A.INSTR_DT , A.SEX_CD , A.BIRTH_DT , A.BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , A.HOME_NEW_YN , A.HOME_ZIP_CD1 || HOME_ZIP_CD2 AS HOME_ZIP_CD , A.HOME_ADDR1 , A.HOME_ADDR2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH1) AS HOME_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH2) AS HOME_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH3) AS HOME_PH3 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH1) AS MOBILE_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH2) AS MOBILE_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH3) AS MOBILE_PH3 , A.ORGN_NEW_YN , A.ORGN_ZIP_CD1 || A.ORGN_ZIP_CD2 AS ORGN_ZIP_CD , A.ORGN_ADDR1 , A.ORGN_ADDR2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL1) AS EMAIL1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL2) AS EMAIL2 , A.DOMAIN_FLAG , A.TEMP_PASS_NO , A.TEMP_PASS_RET_DT , A.TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT , A.EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT , A.OUTSTR_DT , A.MEMO , A.WED_YN , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.RESI_NO) AS M_RESI_NO , A.KOR_NM AS M_KOR_NM , A.CHI_NM AS M_CHI_NM , A.PIC_URL AS M_PIC_URL , A.STR_CD AS M_STR_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD AS M_PUMBUN_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME AS M_PUMBUN_NAME , A.VEN_CD AS M_VEN_CD , C.VEN_NAME AS M_VEN_NAME , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P190', A.JOB_CD) AS M_JOB_NM , A.BIRTH_DT AS M_BIRTH_DT , DECODE(A.BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG,'S','양력','L','음력') AS M_BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , A.HOME_ZIP_CD1 || HOME_ZIP_CD2 AS M_HOME_ZIP_CD , A.HOME_ADDR1 AS M_HOME_ADDR1 , A.HOME_ADDR2 AS M_HOME_ADDR2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH1) AS M_HOME_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH2) AS M_HOME_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.HOME_PH3) AS M_HOME_PH3 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH1) AS M_MOBILE_PH1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH2) AS M_MOBILE_PH2 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.MOBILE_PH3) AS M_MOBILE_PH3 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL1) AS M_EMAIL1 , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('DEC', A.EMAIL2) AS M_EMAIL2 , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'D013', A.DOMAIN_FLAG) AS M_DOMAIN_FLAG , COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P187', A.WED_YN) AS M_WED_YN , A.WORK_TYPE , A.TEMP_ENT_SUP_YN , A.TEMP_ENT_SUP_S_DT , A.TEMP_ENT_SUP_E_DT , A.BRD_FIX_AR_YN , A.BRD_FIX_AR_S_DT , A.BRD_FIX_AR_E_DT , A.LONG_ENT_SUP_YN , A.LONG_ENT_SUP_S_DT , A.LONG_ENT_SUP_E_DT , A.LONG_WORK_YN , A.LONG_WORK_S_DT , A.LONG_WORK_E_DT , A.HI_SCHL_GRDU_YM , A.HI_SCHL_NM , A.HI_SCHL_LOCATION , A.HI_SCHL_GRUD_FLAG , A.UNIVST_GRDU_YM , A.UNIVST_NM , A.UNIVST_LOCATION , A.UNIVST_GRDU_FLAG , A.GRDU_SCHL_GRDU_YM , A.GRDU_SCHL_NM , A.GRDU_SCHL_LOCATION , A.GRDU_SCHL_GRDU_FLAG , A.WORK_S_DT1 , A.WORK_E_DT1 , A.WORK_COMP1 , A.WORK_BRD1 , A.WORK_JOB1 , A.WORK_LOCATION1 , A.WORK_S_DT2 , A.WORK_E_DT2 , A.WORK_COMP2 , A.WORK_BRD2 , A.WORK_JOB2 , A.WORK_LOCATION2 , A.WORK_S_DT3 , A.WORK_E_DT3 , A.WORK_COMP3 , A.WORK_BRD3 , A.WORK_JOB3 , A.WORK_LOCATION3 , A.WORK_S_DT4 , A.WORK_E_DT4 , A.WORK_COMP4 , A.WORK_BRD4 , A.WORK_JOB4 , A.WORK_LOCATION4 , A.DEL_FLAG FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST A , DPS.PC_PBNMST B , DPS.PC_VENMST C WHERE A.PUMBUN_CD =B.PUMBUN_CD(+) AND A.VEN_CD=C.VEN_CD(+) AND A.PUMBUN_CD IN (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? )
AND A.STR_CD = ?
AND A.VEN_CD = ?
AND A.PUMBUN_CD = ?
AND A.KOR_NM LIKE ? || '%'
AND A.WORK_COMP4 = ?
AND A.WORK_BRD4 = ?
AND A.WORK_JOB4 = ?
AND A.WORK_LOCATION4 = ?
AND A.DEL_FLAG = ?
AND A.INSTR_DT >= ? AND A.INSTR_DT <= ?
AND A.OUTSTR_DT >= ? AND A.OUTSTR_DT <= ?
AND TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE) >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(A.REG_DATE) <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.BIRTH_DT >= ? AND A.BIRTH_DT <= ?

INSERT INTO DPS.PC_VENEMPMST ( VENEMP_ID , RESI_NO , KOR_NM , STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , VEN_CD , JOB_CD , BIRTH_DT , BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , SEX_CD , INSTR_DT , HOME_NEW_YN --자택 새 주소 선택여부 , HOME_ZIP_CD1 -- START QUERY 를 따로... , HOME_ZIP_CD2 , HOME_ADDR1 , HOME_ADDR2 -- , HNEW_ZIP_CD1 --새 우편번호 , HNEW_ZIP_CD2 , HNEW_ADDR1 , HNEW_ADDR2 --END , HOME_PH1 , HOME_PH2 , HOME_PH3 , MOBILE_PH1 , MOBILE_PH2 , MOBILE_PH3 , ORGN_NEW_YN --본적 새 주소 선택여부 , ORGN_ZIP_CD1 --본적 우편번호1 START , ORGN_ZIP_CD2 , ORGN_ADDR1 --본적 주소 , ORGN_ADDR2 , ONEW_ZIP_CD1 --본적 새 우편번호 , ONEW_ZIP_CD2 , ONEW_ADDR1 , ONEW_ADDR2-- end , DOMAIN_FLAG , EMAIL1 , EMAIL2 , OUTSTR_DT , TEMP_PASS_NO , TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT , TEMP_PASS_RET_DT , EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT , MEMO , WED_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID , WORK_COMP4 , WORK_BRD4 , WORK_JOB4 , WORK_LOCATION4 ) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(VENEMP_ID),0)+1, 6, 0) FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SUBSTR(?,1,3) , SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ? , ? , SUBSTR(?,1,3) , SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ? , ? , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , ? , SUBSTR(?,1,3) , SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ? , ? , SUBSTR(?,1,3) , SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ? , ? , ? , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO DPS.PC_VENEMPMST ( VENEMP_ID , RESI_NO , KOR_NM , STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , VEN_CD , JOB_CD , BIRTH_DT , BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , SEX_CD , INSTR_DT , HOME_NEW_YN --자택 새 주소 선택여부 , HOME_ZIP_CD1 -- START QUERY 를 따로... , HOME_ZIP_CD2 , HOME_ADDR1 , HOME_ADDR2 -- , HOME_PH1 , HOME_PH2 , HOME_PH3 , MOBILE_PH1 , MOBILE_PH2 , MOBILE_PH3 , ORGN_NEW_YN --본적 새 주소 선택여부 , ORGN_ZIP_CD1 --본적 우편번호1 START , ORGN_ZIP_CD2 , ORGN_ADDR1 --본적 주소 , ORGN_ADDR2 , DOMAIN_FLAG , EMAIL1 , EMAIL2 , OUTSTR_DT , TEMP_PASS_NO , TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT , TEMP_PASS_RET_DT , EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT , MEMO , WED_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(VENEMP_ID),0)+1, 6, 0) FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT INTO DPS.PC_VENEMPMST ( VENEMP_ID , RESI_NO , KOR_NM , STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , VEN_CD , JOB_CD , BIRTH_DT , BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , SEX_CD , INSTR_DT , HOME_NEW_YN --자택 새 주소 선택여부 , HOME_ZIP_CD1 -- START QUERY 를 따로... , HOME_ZIP_CD2 , HOME_ADDR1 , HOME_ADDR2 -- , HNEW_ZIP_CD1 --새 우편번호 , HNEW_ZIP_CD2 , HNEW_ADDR1 , HNEW_ADDR2 --END , HOME_PH1 , HOME_PH2 , HOME_PH3 , MOBILE_PH1 , MOBILE_PH2 , MOBILE_PH3 , ORGN_NEW_YN --본적 새 주소 선택여부 , ORGN_ZIP_CD1 --본적 우편번호1 START , ORGN_ZIP_CD2 , ORGN_ADDR1 --본적 주소 , ORGN_ADDR2 , DOMAIN_FLAG , EMAIL1 , EMAIL2 , OUTSTR_DT , TEMP_PASS_NO , TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT , TEMP_PASS_RET_DT , EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT , MEMO , WED_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(VENEMP_ID),0)+1, 6, 0) FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

INSERT INTO DPS.PC_VENEMPMST ( VENEMP_ID , RESI_NO , KOR_NM , STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , VEN_CD , JOB_CD , BIRTH_DT , BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG , SEX_CD , INSTR_DT , HOME_NEW_YN --자택 새 주소 선택여부 , HOME_ZIP_CD1 -- START QUERY 를 따로... , HOME_ZIP_CD2 , HOME_ADDR1 , HOME_ADDR2 -- , HOME_PH1 , HOME_PH2 , HOME_PH3 , MOBILE_PH1 , MOBILE_PH2 , MOBILE_PH3 , ORGN_NEW_YN --본적 새 주소 선택여부 , ORGN_ZIP_CD1 --본적 우편번호1 START , ORGN_ZIP_CD2 , ORGN_ADDR1 --본적 주소 , ORGN_ADDR2 , ONEW_ZIP_CD1 --본적 새 우편번호 , ONEW_ZIP_CD2 , ONEW_ADDR1 , ONEW_ADDR2-- end , DOMAIN_FLAG , EMAIL1 , EMAIL2 , OUTSTR_DT , TEMP_PASS_NO , TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT , TEMP_PASS_RET_DT , EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT , MEMO , WED_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(VENEMP_ID),0)+1, 6, 0) FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST) , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

UPDATE DPS.PC_VENEMPMST SET KOR_NM = ? , PUMBUN_CD = ? , STR_CD = ? , VEN_CD = ? , JOB_CD = ? , BIRTH_DT = ? , BIRTH_LUNAR_FLAG = ? , SEX_CD = ? , INSTR_DT = ? , HOME_NEW_YN = ? , HOME_ZIP_CD1 = SUBSTR(?,1,3) , HOME_ZIP_CD2 = SUBSTR(?,4,3) , HOME_ADDR1 = ? , HOME_ADDR2 = ? , HNEW_ZIP_CD1 = SUBSTR(?,1,3) , HNEW_ZIP_CD2 = SUBSTR(?,4,3) , HNEW_ADDR1= ? , HNEW_ADDR2= ? , HOME_PH1 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , HOME_PH2 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , HOME_PH3 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , MOBILE_PH1 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , MOBILE_PH2 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , MOBILE_PH3 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , ORGN_NEW_YN = ? , ORGN_ZIP_CD1 = SUBSTR(?,1,3) , ORGN_ZIP_CD2 = SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ORGN_ADDR1 = ? , ORGN_ADDR2 = ? , ONEW_ZIP_CD1 = SUBSTR(?,1,3) , ONEW_ZIP_CD2 = SUBSTR(?,4,3) , ONEW_ADDR1= ? , ONEW_ADDR2= ? , DOMAIN_FLAG = ? , EMAIL1 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , EMAIL2 = DCS.SC_Crypto_FUN('ENC', ?) , OUTSTR_DT = ? , TEMP_PASS_NO = ? , TEMP_PASS_ISSUE_DT = ? , TEMP_PASS_RET_DT = ? , EMP_ID_ISSUE_DT = ? , MEMO = ? , WED_YN = ? , WORK_TYPE =? , TEMP_ENT_SUP_YN =? , TEMP_ENT_SUP_S_DT =? , TEMP_ENT_SUP_E_DT =? , BRD_FIX_AR_YN =? , BRD_FIX_AR_S_DT =? , BRD_FIX_AR_E_DT =? , LONG_ENT_SUP_YN =? , LONG_ENT_SUP_S_DT =? , LONG_ENT_SUP_E_DT =? , LONG_WORK_YN =? , LONG_WORK_S_DT =? , LONG_WORK_E_DT =? , HI_SCHL_GRDU_YM =? , HI_SCHL_NM =? , HI_SCHL_LOCATION =? , HI_SCHL_GRUD_FLAG =? , UNIVST_GRDU_YM =? , UNIVST_NM =? , UNIVST_LOCATION =? , UNIVST_GRDU_FLAG =? , GRDU_SCHL_GRDU_YM =? , GRDU_SCHL_NM =? , GRDU_SCHL_LOCATION =? , GRDU_SCHL_GRDU_FLAG =? , WORK_S_DT1 =? , WORK_E_DT1 =? , WORK_COMP1 =? , WORK_BRD1 =? , WORK_JOB1 =? , WORK_LOCATION1 =? , WORK_S_DT2 =? , WORK_E_DT2 =? , WORK_COMP2 =? , WORK_BRD2 =? , WORK_JOB2 =? , WORK_LOCATION2 =? , WORK_S_DT3 =? , WORK_E_DT3 =? , WORK_COMP3 =? , WORK_BRD3 =? , WORK_JOB3 =? , WORK_LOCATION3 =? , WORK_S_DT4 =? , WORK_E_DT4 =? , WORK_COMP4 =? , WORK_BRD4 =? , WORK_JOB4 =? , WORK_LOCATION4 =? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE VENEMP_ID = ?

UPDATE DPS.PC_VENEMPMST SET STR_CD = '99' , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE
WHERE VENEMP_ID = ?

INSERT INTO DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL (VENEMP_ID, DTL_FLAG, DTL_SEQ_NO, DTL_CONTENTS, REG_DATE, REG_ID, MOD_DATE, MOD_ID) VALUES ( DECODE(?,'0',(SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(VENEMP_ID),0), 6, 0) FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPMST),?), ?, (SELECT NVL(MAX(DTL_SEQ_NO),0)+1 FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL WHERE VENEMP_ID = ? AND DTL_FLAG = ?), ?, SYSDATE, ?, SYSDATE, ?)
UPDATE DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL SET DTL_CONTENTS = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = ? WHERE VENEMP_ID = ? AND DTL_FLAG = ? AND DTL_SEQ_NO = ?

UPDATE DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL SET DTL_FLAG = '99', DTL_SEQ_NO = (SELECT NVL(MAX(DTL_SEQ_NO),0)+1 FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL WHERE DTL_FLAG = '99'), MOD_DATE = SYSDATE, MOD_ID = ? WHERE VENEMP_ID = ? AND DTL_FLAG = ? AND DTL_SEQ_NO = ?
SELECT VENEMP_ID, DTL_FLAG, DTL_SEQ_NO, DTL_CONTENTS,TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE FROM DPS.PC_VENEMPDTL WHERE VENEMP_ID = ? AND DTL_FLAG = ?
